>
[Ghost Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=5751) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=751" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 49 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your connection to the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=39) ensures that your blows strike true against spectral beings. Your weapon and unarmed Strikes against [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=632) creatures become [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644). If they are already magical, they instead gain the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840) property rune.
